SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.business

Interface AdminInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminOperations
public interface AdminInterface
Interface representing the operations available to an Admin. Provides methods to manage courses, professors, and students.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCourse(Course course)
    Adds a new course to the system.
    void
    addProfessor(Professor professor)
    Adds a new professor to the system.
    void
    approveStudent(int studentId)
    Approves a student's registration.
    void
    viewAllCourses()
    Retrieves and displays all courses in the system.
    void
    viewAllProfessors()
    Retrieves and displays all professors in the system.
    void
    viewAllStudents()
    Retrieves and displays all students in the system.

  • Method Details

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(Course course) throws CourseNotAddedException
      Adds a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      course - The course object containing course details to be added.
      Throws:
      CourseNotAddedException - If the course cannot be added due to some issues (e.g., validation errors).

    • addProfessor

      void addProfessor(Professor professor) throws ProfessorNotAddedException
      Adds a new professor to the system.
      Parameters:
      professor - The professor object containing professor details to be added.
      Throws:
      ProfessorNotAddedException - If the professor cannot be added due to some issues (e.g., validation errors).

    • approveStudent

      void approveStudent(int studentId) throws StudentNotApprovedException, StudentNotFoundException
      Approves a student's registration.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to be approved.
      Throws:
      StudentNotApprovedException - If the student's approval cannot be processed due to system errors or validation issues.
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student with the specified ID cannot be found in the system.

    • viewAllProfessors

      void viewAllProfessors()
      Retrieves and displays all professors in the system. The implementation should handle retrieving the list of professors and displaying it.

    • viewAllStudents

      void viewAllStudents()
      Retrieves and displays all students in the system. The implementation should handle retrieving the list of students and displaying it.

    • viewAllCourses

      void viewAllCourses()
      Retrieves and displays all courses in the system. The implementation should handle retrieving the list of courses and displaying it.
